titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling of genetically engineered fish.
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling of genetically engineered fish.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to deem a food to be misbranded if it contains genetically-engineered fish unless the food bears a label stating that fact.
